upgrades.changelog:
Includes firmware versions: 3.0, 3.01, 3.40
* Added a setting to change scene control paddle mapping (Parameter 23).
* Added a setting to disable programming from paddles (Parameter 24).
* Added basic set reports sent to Group 2 and 3 when the dimmer is operated manually for double tap to full brightness and night light modes.
* Changed direct association group 2 and 3 behavior (the switch now sends a report whenever a paddle is tapped, regardless of its state.
* Fixed the instant ramp rate bug (the 3-way switch wouldn't switch the light if ramp rate was set to 0).
* Fixed the night light bug (it no longer activates at all when disabled).
* Fixed default brightness level bug (the 3-way switch now also honors the value of this setting instead of turning the light back to the last brightness).
* Improved power outage behavior in smart bulb mode
